headline: Building Shipper (YC W19). Hiring Leaders and Engineers.
summary:
Entrepreneurial Career: 
2016 - Founded Shipper, a new up and coming exciting logistic platform.
2016 - Sold CheapCard, 12 years old online shopping website, one of the first online shopping websites in Australia.
2015 - Joined Qareer Group Asia, parent company of Qerja and Jobs.id, to empower the career of Indonesian people.
2012 - Lead ocash to acquisition by MOL Malaysia (Subsidiary of MOL Global) and formed MOL Australia.
2011 - Founded ocash - virtual currency system to fill the gaps in the Australia market.
2009 - Shut Ocenia Cyber Cafe - lack of research has resulted in the failure of the cafe.
2008 - Founded Ocenia Cyber Cafe - a hype and chic internet cafe in inner city of Sydney.
2006 - Founded OnlineGamez Australia to distribute online games in Australia. OnlineGamez Australia is then acquired by ocash.
2004 - Founded CheapCard, one of the earliest online shopping website in Australia, an online retail for cards (calling cards, mobile recharge, or game cards).

Professional Career:
2006 - 2011: Engineering Lead for Gecko Webs Internet Services
2004 - 2006: Web Developer for LJ Hooker
2001 - 2002: Web Developer for INTI College Sarawak

experiences.title: Consultant
experiences.description:
- Consulting, planning, developing and executing clients projects
- Past Clients: Pelikan Artline, Rotary Club of Chatswood (Voluntary), Wagner Australia and Eyecatchers Optical
- Current Client: ACCO Australia (Subsidiary of NYSE: ACCO) - Migration of Online Web System from PHP to SAP

experiences.title: Founder / Director / Partner
experiences.description:
Founded CheapCard in 2004 when there were not many online shopping websites available yet.
Learnt PHP to setup CheapCard.com.au.

Cyglynx P/L was then incorporated with CheapCard as one of the businesses.

CheapCard: http://www.cheapcard.com.au (2004)
GameWithCoin: http://www.gamewithcoin.com (2014)

Key Achievements: 
•	Pioneer in Online Shopping
•	Self-taught PHP to build an operational online shop within 3 months time 
•	Increased sales volume with 200% YOY growth
•	Secured various suppliers for the calling cards and mobile recharge vouchers
•	Negotiated exclusive deal with Softnyx (Korea) to distribute their Softnyx Prepaid Cards in Australia
•	Successfully Implemented Fraud Vetting System
•	Integration with Various Payment Channels effectively
•	Integration with Bitcoin payment. For GameWithCoin, Bitcoin is the only payment method.

experiences.title: Founder
experiences.description:
ocash is a virtual currency system in Australia, working closely with game publishers to help the payment system for Australian gamers. Beside online games credits, we are also talking deals for console games credits, software and other online contents.

Key Achievements: 
•	Led ocash to acquisition by MOL AccessPortal Sdn Bhd (Malaysia) 
•	Built a team to setup ocash
•	Negotiated a listing with a major distributor, epay Australia, a market leader in digital  distribution with over 25000 touch points without listing fee

experiences.title: CEO & Founder
experiences.description:
Strategic planning on distribution of virtual gaming cash in the local market.
Experience in online game and mobile contents industry of Australia. 
Involved in billing software development for virtual gaming cash.

experiences.title: Engineering Lead
experiences.description:
Leading a team of engineers for web application specialists company in setting up coding standards, best practise of implementation and vulnerability prevention.

Key Achievements: 
•	Successfully dispatched web applications for Police NSW, Pelikan Artline and Football NSW.
•	Successfully patched web servers to be PCI Compliance
•	Provided data encryption and data integrity practice to protect the client’s data
•	Successfully implemented the latest PHP and Javascript technology in the development
•	Successfully implemented a coding practice standard for the company, to remove wastage of lines and save costs.

experiences.title: Chief Executive Officer
experiences.description:
Overseeing MOL operations in Australia and forming strategic partnership with local partners to expand the coverage of MOL service. MOL Australia is part of a NASDAQ Listed Company - MOL Global (MOLG).

Full responsibility for the growth of the company in all sectors (financial, marketing, operations, human resource, product development, distribution, merchant acquisition) to improve results and to implement the best business practices despite various challenges from the parent company.  Perform monthly financial review of company results.

Key Achievements:
•	Responsible for MOL operations, sales and business developments in Australia, New Zealand and Pacific Islands. MOL Australia is part of a NASDAQ Listed Company - MOL Global (MOLG)
•	Reduce fraudulent transactions (banking and credit card) to 0.0001% in 2014
•	Head business processed improvement projects to compliment existing process from MOL Global
•	Grow Revenue and GP of MOL Australia by 200% in 2014
•	Develop new eCommerce site to sell game credits directly to gamers
•	Increased the branding of MOL in Australia
•	Setup New Zealand operations and working on new market, ie Fiji and the Pacific
•	Successful new product setup: Microsoft Xbox, Steam Wallet and League of Legends
•	Organised various eSports Tournaments; Online and Offline
•	Setup various type of channels on various platforms from physical retailers, online and mobile
•	Maintain great relationships with distribution and content partners
•	Setup standard for accounting practise
•	Strategic partner alliances with various lifestyle products, eg. Roccat, Razer, Thermaltake and other local and overseas game publishers, like Riot Games, Wargaming, Valve, Nexon, AsiaSoft, Garena and many others
•	Successfully setup fraud vetting process

accomplishment_projects.title: MOL Personal Store (For Platinum and Gold Customers)
accomplishment_projects.description:
This is special online store created for end users who are loyal to us and we give them some rewards by allowing them to purchase our products with big discount. We are not able to do that on our main MOL portal because it was managed by head office.

I collected the data, created the backend and setup the infrastructure. My team member Emmanuelle help with the graphics and the HTML setup and Aiza is helping with the order fulfillment process.

accomplishment_projects.title: Timor Leste Fund Raising - Dinner with Prime Minister
accomplishment_projects.description:
The Rotary Club of Chatswood has invited the Prime Minister, The Hon Tony Abbott MP to be the guest of honour at a special dinner on 6th August 2014. The principle beneficiary of the evening will be the Timor-Leste Dental Program which engages Australian volunteer dentists to provide free dental health services in the rural villages of Timor-Leste, in partnership with Carmelite Sisters in Maubara. The TLDP program was established ten years ago under the auspices of Rotary Australia World Community Service (RAWCS), while some residual funds will be used to support other Rotary projects.

The event was a huge success with us raising over $80,000 for the RAWCS project Timor Leste Dental Program (TLDP) and other Rotary projects. The TLDP was initiated by Chatswood Rotary in 2003 with Dick Abbott and Peter Kindred and provides volunteer dentists and equipment on a regular basis in Maubara, on Timor Leste’s north coast. 

Our donation enabled the TLDP to but a new Toyota LWB Troopie 4WD to transport the dentists and their supplies up into the highlands where local people receive free dental treatment.

I am responsible for the media, creative and technical parts of the projects, including slideshows, flyers, brochures, tickets, websites, stage and program.

accomplishment_projects.title: MOL Zone
accomplishment_projects.description:
This is meant to be a collection for our local projects, which could vary from competitions to a team that we sponsor.

Wordpress is cool. My creative designer played a lot of part in this project. My role is to make sure it gets to the concept that I want.

accomplishment_projects.title: Pelikan Artline Website
accomplishment_projects.description: Corporate website for Pelikan Artline, which also serves as B2B eCommerce website. I work on the backend of the website.

accomplishment_projects.title: CheapCard Website
accomplishment_projects.description:
CheapCard is an Australia-based online shop specializing in selling prepaid mobile recharge, international calling card and game card.

In July 2004, I designed and coded V1. - https://web.archive.org/web/20040413020812/http://www.cheapcard.com.au/
In Aug 2006, I also designed and coded V2 - https://web.archive.org/web/20050803083502/http://www.cheapcard.com.au/
In 2013, I have become project manager to make sure V3 was launched properly.
Then throughout the whole live of V3, I have coded to add few changes:
1. Sister site - http://www.gamewithcoin.com (2014)
2. Bitcoin payment for both site (2014)
3. Affiliate account (2013)
4. Reward system (2013)
5. Wholesale system (2013)

recommendations:
Prima Siswanto

      
          
          



              
                
        
              
  

      
          I've worked alongside Budi for close to one year, he is one of those rare managers who also naturally serves as an inspiring mentor. That's one of the things that's so remarkable about Budi. He demonstrates not only mastery for his core role, but also the ability to take on projects that are both difficult and critical to the company's growth.

This rare mix of great leadership and awesome voice when singing mandarin song, Budi sets a great example for the rest of the team, and that explains why everyone loves working with him. I certainly miss working with him and I have only optimistic predictions for his career and entrepreneurship trajectory.

Kebrasca King

      
          
          



              
                
        
              
  

      
          Budi offers world class experience within technology & gaming. I have worked alongside MOL for over 2 years and Budi has provided valuable services & insights into key partnerships. His knowledge is second to none, if you want a "GO TO" man within this space. Look no further.
